alert.note: Alert for Bailey; Castro; Lamb; Parmer (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 23 at 3:27PM CST by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Bailey, eastern Parmer, Castro and northern Lamb Counties through 430 PM CST... At 326 PM CST, a line of strong thunderstorms extended from 5 miles west of Summerfield to 4 miles northwest of Muleshoe Wildlife Refuge. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects and vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Muleshoe, Dimmitt, Friona, Olton, Hart, Earth, Sudan, Summerfield, Needmore, Easter, Lazbuddie, Progress, Black, Nazareth, and Springlake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
